channel.title: Got a Vps, Done Hosting, Read 4 more info
channel.description: Ok so this probably does not go here(I know) but I have been hosting a server for awhile and quite frankly got tired of all the hassle. I have a decent amount of knowledge when it comes to java coding, but I am not a pro. Anyways what I thought would be a good idea for me and maybe someone else, is that I will give my vps away, well not totally, I will stand along side someone who is atleast as good as i am at coding or better, all I want is admin and the rights to restart or fix server if the other person isn't on, so basically I want Co-Owner. If your worried about some "noob" trying to fool you into giving him a admin spot and messing things up don't worry... I am a family man, married with 1 kid, I do this only out of boredom and being unemployed I guess. I have played runescape since 2001 and that's why I guess I am addicted. If you want to go in on this with me just send me a private message or add my xbox live gt, Steal Your Mojo, I don't use messenger, so these are the only 2 ways to get ahold of me.

item.title: Got a Vps, Done Hosting, Read 4 more info
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

krackkid:

This is not a server development, if you wish to start a development team please go to the proper section and read the rules stickied at the top. Offering to be a hoster/coder is not allowed.

Read full topic
